author: David Benoit
title: Bill Ackmanâ€™s Pershing Square Faces Wave of Investor Redemptions
text:
William Ackman, the famed shareholder activist, is losing investors at a rapid pace and facing a future that would no longer include managing a private hedge fund.
After three years of subpar performance, most investors in his Pershing Square Capital Management LP have asked for money back, with about two-thirds of the cash that could be withdrawn at the end of the year being pulled, according to people familiar with the matter. Redemptions, which involve only a portion of total assets, have continued at a similar rate this...
